author: BBC News
description:
Russia has reacted to comments from Donald Trump claiming that Russia is a “paper tiger”, whose weak economy leaves them exposed to a Ukrainian counter offensive retaking all of their lost territory. It’s a huge shift from the president, but how seriously can we take his words? Catriona Perry and Vitaly Shevchenko join Adam to answer that question, and more.

Plus, Faisal Islam is in the studio to tell us about a big news story that’s coming down the track; an OHas President Trump changed his mind about Russia and Ukraine?BR forecast on productivity that could prove to be a great big thorn in the side of the UK government ahead of the November budget.

You can now listen to Newscast on a smart speaker. If you want to listen, just say "Ask BBC Sounds to play Newscast”. It works on most smart speakers.

You can take part in the Newscast census here - https://bbc.in/newscastcensus

title: Has President Trump changed his mind about Russia and Ukraine? | BBC News

author: BBC News
description:
Two detainees have died and another is critically injured after a suspected sniper opened fire at an immigration detention centre in Dallas, Texas, officials said.
 
Authorities said the gunman died from a self-inflicted gunshot wound.
 
FBI Director Kash Patel posted a photo of unused ammunition recovered from the scene, in which one casing has the phrase "ANTI-ICE" on it.
 
The FBI is investigating the incident as "an act of targeted violence".

Subscribe here: http://bit.ly/1rbfUog

For more news, analysis and features visit: www.bbc.com/news 

#Dallas #Texas #BBCNews
title: 'Anti-ICE' messaging found at scene of deadly Dallas immigration centre shooting | BBC News

title: China evacuates nearly two million as Super Typhoon Ragasa makes landfall. #China #Typhoon #BBCNews

author: BBC News
description:
Italy's defence minister has condemned what he said was an overnight drone attack by unidentified perpetrators on a flotilla trying to breach Israel's naval blockade of Gaza to deliver aid.
 
Guido Crosetto also said he had ordered an Italian Navy frigate to head towards the 52 boats in the Global Sumud Flotilla (GSF) to assist Italian citizens on board.
 
The GSF said several boats reported explosions and unidentified objects being dropped, as well as drones overhead and communications jamming. It accused Israel of a "dangerous escalation".
 
Israel's government has not commented - but it has previously said it will not let the flotilla reach its destination.

Subscribe here: http://bit.ly/1rbfUog

For more news, analysis and features visit: www.bbc.com/news 

#Israel #Gaza #BBCNews
title: Italy condemns 'drone attack' on Gaza aid flotilla | BBC News

author: BBC News
description:
There are "multiple injuries and fatalities" after a shooting at an immigration facility in Texas, Department of Homeland Security Secretary Kristi Noem says.

The attack happened at a Dallas field office for US Immigration and Customs Enforcement.

Dallas Police said a gunman opened fire from a nearby building.

One victim has died at the scene and two people have been rushed to hospital.

The shooter died of a self-inflicted gunshot wound. 

Subscribe here: http://bit.ly/1rbfUog

For more news, analysis and features visit: www.bbc.com/news 

#Texas #BBCNews
title: Multiple injuries and fatalities reported after shooting at Dallas ICE facility | BBC News

author: BBC News
description:
US President Donald Trump has said Kyiv can "win all of Ukraine back in its original form", marking a major shift in his position on the war with Russia.
 
In a post on his Truth Social platform, he said Ukraine could get back "the original borders from where this war started" with the support of Europe and Nato, due to pressures on Russia's economy.
 
His comments came after talks with Ukrainian President Volodymyr Zelensky, held after Trump had addressed the UN General Assembly in New York on Tuesday.
 
Trump has repeatedly expressed his desire to end the war, but has previously warned that process would likely involve Ukraine giving up some territory - an outcome Zelensky has consistently rejected.

Subscribe here: http://bit.ly/1rbfUog

For more news, analysis and features visit: www.bbc.com/news 

#DonaldTrump #Ukraine #BBCNews
title: Kyiv can win all of Ukraine back from Russia, US President Donald Trump says | BBC News

author: BBC News
description:
Huntington's disease has been successfully treated for the first time, say doctors.
 
The disease runs through families, relentlessly kills brain cells and resembles a combination of dementia, Parkinson's and motor neurone disease.
 
The new treatment is a type of gene therapy given during 12 to 18 hours of delicate brain surgery.
 
An emotional research team became tearful as they described how data shows the disease was slowed by 75% in patients.

Subscribe here: http://bit.ly/1rbfUog

For more news, analysis and features visit: www.bbc.com/news 

#HuntingtonsDisease #Health #BBCNews
title: Huntington's disease successfully treated for first time | BBC News

author: BBC News
title: At least 62 people have been injured by the typhoon in Hong Kong. #HongKong #TyphoonRagasa #BBCNews

author: BBC News
description:
Super Typhoon Ragasa made landfall in China, forcing some two million people to evacuate in preparation.
 
At least 15 people have died in Taiwan after a lake burst, causing severe flooding in the east.
 
The equivalent of a Category 5 hurricane, Ragasa is the world's strongest storm this year and has been roaring over the South China Sea for days.
 
The typhoon did not make landfall in Hong Kong, but left 62 people injured after it skirted the coastline unleashing powerful winds and heavy rain.

Subscribe here: http://bit.ly/1rbfUog

For more news, analysis and features visit: www.bbc.com/news 

#SuperTyphoon #TyphoonRagasa #BBCNews
title: Super Typhoon Ragasa makes landfall in China | BBC News
